Module it.unicam.cs.massimopavoni.swarmsimulator.swarm
Package it.unicam.cs.massimopavoni.swarmsimulator.swarm.strategy.directives

Record Class Follow

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
it.unicam.cs.massimopavoni.swarmsimulator.swarm.strategy.directives.Follow
Record Components:
echo - echo to follow
range - range within which the drone can hear the echo
speed - movement speed to set
All Implemented Interfaces:
Directive, MovementDirective
public record Follow(String echo, double range, double speed) extends Record implements MovementDirective
Follow movement directive, for setting a drone direction to the average position of drones radiating a specific echo.

      Constructor for a follow movement directive.
      Parameters:
      echo - echo string
      range - echo range
      speed - movement speed
      Throws:
      DirectiveException - if the echo does not match the defined pattern or if the range or speed are not positive
